string.name: isTruckDeliveryMessage
string.p: Some heavy or bulky items cannot be delivered via USPS or FedEx.These items must be delivered via truck.
Additional delivery charges may apply and will be reflected at checkout.
You will be contacted in 7 to 14 days from the time the item is shipped to schedule a delivery appointment.You must be present to accept delivery.

Please note that some states may charge a recycle fee per item.

"As for May 1, 2015 we are required by law to charge a $9 recycle fee on each mattress and box spring sold to Connecticut customers. You'll see a flat rate mattress recycle fee of $9 per unit on your checkout total. Each mattress and box spring are considered separate units. So for a queen size bed set the total fee would be $18 before sales tax is applied. Note that the reycle fee does not count toward the free shipping order minimum, and isn't eligible for earning or redeeming, and isn't eligble for earning or redeeming JCPenney Coupons and Rewards.
For more information visit www.mattressrecyclingcouncil.org"

"Some manufactures place restrictions on how low we can advertise their products. It's called the 'minimum advertised price'. For you, all it really means is that you are getting a killer deal, but they make you take a few extra steps to see it (i.e., adding it to your bag). We know it's a pain, but it'll be worth it in the end, promise. And, if you don't want to purchase it, feel free to remove it whenever."
